title: Sverre Olaf Lie
summary: Sverre Olaf Lie (born 27 February 1938, Oslo, died 8 March 2023) was a Norwegian pediatrician. He was head of the Pediatric Research Institute at University of Oslo from 1975 till 1989 and chairman and professor at the department of pediatrics at the National Hospital of Norway, Rikshospitalet from 1989 till 2006.
